title: Business Description
content: Keystorm Labs is a boutique mechanical keyboard company dedicated to crafting high-performance, fully customizable keyboards for enthusiasts, gamers, and professionals. Our mission is to blend precision engineering with personal expression, offering a wide range of options to build your dream keyboard from the ground up.

title: Storm60 Keyboard Details
content: Storm60 is a compact 60% keyboard featuring Gateron Red linear switches, a matte black aluminum case, and white-on-black PBT keycaps. It connects via USB-C and is priced at $129.99 with a 10% discount for first-time buyers.

title: EchoTKL Keyboard Details
content: EchoTKL is a tenkeyless keyboard with Kailh Box White clicky switches, a translucent RGB-lit case, and double-shot ABS keycaps. It’s priced at $149.99 with a $10 bundle discount.

title: NimbusPro Keyboard Details
content: NimbusPro is a full-size wireless keyboard with hot-swappable sockets, Bluetooth 5.1 and USB-C connectivity, and a sleek silver aluminum case. Price: $189.99. Free shipping on orders over $150.

title: Pulse75 Keyboard Details
content: Pulse75 is a 75% layout keyboard with Cherry MX Brown tactile switches, a gunmetal gray case, and optional artisan keycaps. Wired or Bluetooth. Price: $159.99. 15% off for newsletter subscribers.

title: NovaMini Keyboard Details
content: NovaMini is a 60% Bluetooth-only keyboard with Gateron Yellow linear switches, frosted acrylic case, and pastel-themed PBT keycaps. Price: $139.99. Buy 2, get 1 50% off.

title: How to Order
content: Users can browse the catalog, customize their keyboard, add to cart, and checkout using credit/debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

title: Shipping Details
content: Shipping requires full name, address, contact number, and email. Options include standard, express, and international. Free shipping on orders over $150 (U.S. only).

title: Support & Returns
content: Issues like defective parts, wrong items, or connectivity problems can be resolved via chatbot, email, or phone. Free replacements or refunds available depending on the case.

title: Warranty and Compatibility FAQs
content: All keyboards have a 1-year warranty. Keycaps fit MX-style stems. Bluetooth models support Windows, macOS, iOS, Android.

title: Switch Types Explained
content: Linear switches (Gateron Red/Yellow) are smooth and quiet. Tactile switches (Cherry MX Brown) offer bump feedback. Clicky switches (Kailh Box White) provide audible clicks.

title: Order Tracking via Chatbot
content: Users can enter their order number to get real-time updates, estimated delivery, and tracking links via chatbot.

title: Product Reviews and Sentiment
content: Each product includes verified user reviews and ratings. Chatbot can summarize feedback and highlight pros/cons using sentiment analysis.

title: Keystorm Rewards Program
content: Earn 1 point per $1 spent. 100 points = $10 discount. Birthday bonus: 50 points. Referral bonus: 100 points. Points redeemable at checkout.
